content: For the fiscal year, net income attributable to Forestar increased 62% to $178.8 million or $3.59 per diluted share, compared to $110.2 million for $2.25 per diluted share in fiscal 2021 consolidated revenues for the year total $1.5 billion, which included $36.8 million of track sales and other revenue. The prior year period included in $18.1 million of pre-tax loss on extinguishment of debt related to the redemption of the companyâs 8% senior notes, excluding that charge, pre-tax income for fiscal 2022 increased 43% and our pre-tax profit margin improved 310 basis points.
